subject: Re: My First File
author: Misty
full_text:
Ive tried all kinds of stuff. Musical notes, snippets of dialogue in 
multiple languages, allophones, crowd noise, me saying "the quick brown 
fox.." pangram worked very well. If you want I can send you a few that 
have worked for me or upload them to my esnips.

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@...m, "Rebecca" <harvesthearth@...> wrote:
>
> Misty posted:
> > Cool Becca. Sounded like you used the allophone file for the raw
> audio. Ive had some good results using Stefans evpmaker software. 
> 
> I did. I think that sample was the allophone slowed by 20%.
> 
> What else other than white noise / allophone do people use?
> 
> ~ Becca
>
